New Records: Paul Goldschmidt passes DiMaggio on all-time HR list
Post-Match Reflections: Seth Halvorsen closes out incredible 10-8 victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nootbaar, Goldschmidt hit back-to-back HRs in the 1st
With his 227th HR, Charlie Blackmon tied Carlos González for 5th on the Rockies' all-time list
